title: Our Father
description:
Tig and Cheryl recap the new Netflix true crime doc "Our Father" on this week's episode of True Story! Cheryl takes Tig to task for spilling beans, plus Dr. Phil impressions, law-breaking stories, and much more! *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
